text: {"tiddlers":{"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released":{"text":"The plugin library for the latest and greatest plugins from [ext[t5a|https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io.git]]; most recent released versions of plugins by [ext[Andrew|http://t5a.github.io/#Andrew%20Harrison]].","url":"https://t5a.github.io/plugins","title":"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"Tiddlywiki Library for Plugins by Andrew Harrison"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/controls":{"text":"<$list filter='[all[shadows]tag[$:/tags/Stylesheet]prefix[$:/plugins/]limit[1]]'><$macrocall $name='tabs' tabsList='[all[shadows]tag[$:/tags/Stylesheet]prefix[$:/plugins/]]' default={{!!title}} class='tc-vertical' template='$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/template'/>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/controls","tags":"$:/tags/ControlPanel/Appearance","caption":"Plugin Tweaks"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/icon":{"text":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/image":{"text":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/image","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/license":{"text":"Plugin Tweaks Copyright (c) 2019-<> Andrew Harrison [[BSD 3-Clause License|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE]]","url":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE","type":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/license","tags":"$:/tags/License","license-type":"BSD 3-Clause License"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/readme":{"text":"This plugin adds the ''Plugin Tweaks'' tab to the Appearance tab in the{{$:/core/images/options-button}}ControlPanel. It provides edit fields for changing plugin stylesheet values that are stored in fields. This plugin comprises: * Control settings * Template","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/readme"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/stylesheet":{"text":".tc-badge-plugintweaks {fill:#000;stroke:#0f3;stroke-width:2;}.tc-icon-plugintweaks {fill:#0f3;height:24pt;width:24pt;}","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/stylesheet","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/template":{"text":"<$tiddler tiddler=<>><$list filter='[all[current]fields[]sort[title]] -caption -created -creator -modified -modifier -tags -text -title' variable='currentField'><$text text=<>/>:<$edit-text tiddler=<> field=<> placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Fields/Add/Value/Placeholder}}/>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks/template"}}}
title: $:/plugins/ajh/plugintweaks
